sentence.Network_en: Kudzu is a leguminous annuals, thermophilic heat - resistant, drought - tolerant, adapt mountain grown.
sentence.Network_cn: 粉葛属豆科一年生植物, 喜温耐热 、 耐旱, 适应山区种植.

sentence.Network_en: Any of several other leguminous plants, such as the rose acacia.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种高大的澳洲金合欢属植物, 出产价值昂贵的黑色木材.

sentence.Network_en: The consumption of leguminous plants seems negatively correlated with breast cancer.
sentence.Network_cn: 豆科植物的消费似乎和乳腺癌成负相关.
